mapper.sql: adminId, adminName, adminPhone, adminType, adminBelong, shopId, trainId, isDel, createTime, adminPassword
mapper.select: SELECT a.*,d1.INFO AS adminTypeInfo,d2.INFO AS adminBelongInfo,d3.shopName AS shopIdInfo,d4.trainName AS trainIdInfo,d5.INFO AS isDelInfo FROM j_admin a LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d1 ON a.adminType = d1.ID LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d2 ON a.adminBelong = d2.ID LEFT JOIN j_shop d3 ON a.shopId = d3.shopId LEFT JOIN j_train d4 ON a.trainId = d4.trainId LEFT JOIN j_dict_info d5 ON a.isDel = d5.ID WHERE isDel = 16 LIMIT #{page},#{size}
SELECT a.accessText,a.accessUrl FROM j_access a LEFT JOIN j_access_dict ad ON a.accessId = ad.accessId LEFT JOIN j_admin adm ON ad.adminTypeId = adm.adminType WHERE adm.adminId = #{0} AND isDel = 16
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM j_admin WHERE isDel = 16
